snippet: An Institute for Supply Management report showed that weak consumer spending and fewer business orders were slowing factory output in the United States.
abstract: Institute for Supply Management reports that American factory activity declined for the third straight month in August as new orders, production and employment all fell; report adds to signs that manufacturing is struggling globally amid a sluggish economy.
lead_paragraph: An Institute for Supply Management report showed that weak consumer spending and fewer business orders were slowing factory output in the United States.

headline.seo: U.S. Manufacturing Activity Declined in August
